mapper.select: SELECT content_id, content_type_id, title, addr1, addr2, zipcode, tel, first_image, view_count, sido_code, gugun_code, latitude, longitude, like_count, rate, total_count FROM attraction_info ORDER BY like_count DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT ai.content_id, ai.content_type_id, ai.title, ad.overview, ai.addr1, ai.addr2, ai.zipcode, ai.tel, ai.first_image, ai.view_count, ai.sido_code, ai.gugun_code, ai.latitude, ai.longitude, ai.like_count, ai.rate, ai.total_count FROM attraction_info ai JOIN attraction_description ad ON ai.content_id = ad.content_id WHERE ai.content_id = #{contentId}

SELECT r.review_id, r.content_id, r.member_id, m.nickname, r.rating, r.review_text, r.created_at FROM attraction_review r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_id = m.member_id WHERE content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
